svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" modified="2021-02-01T04:31:33.408Z" agent="5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/13.9.9 Chrome/85.0.4183.121 Electron/10.1.5 Safari/537.36" etag="p4vTtp57RZpcyiS3TJcD" version="13.9.9" type="device"><diagram id="C5RBs43oDa-KdzZeNtuy" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 162px; height: 50px; padding-top: 140px; margin-left: 0px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; width: 162px; height: 50px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; width: 100%; height: 100%; white-space: nowrap;

p.style: margin: 0px ; margin-top: 4px ; text-align: center ; text-decoration: underline

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 162px; height: 50px; padding-top: 140px; margin-left: 200px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; width: 162px; height: 50px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; width: 100%; height: 100%; white-space: nowrap;

p.style: margin: 0px ; margin-top: 4px ; text-align: center ; text-decoration: underline

g.text: - model : Matrix4f 模型变换矩阵
- view : Matrix4f 视口变换矩阵
- projection : Matrix4f 投影变换矩阵
- pos_buf : map<int, vector<Vector3f>> 位置缓冲
- ind_buf : map<int, vector<Vector3i>> 编号缓冲
+ set_model(M) : 设置模型变换矩阵
+ set_view(V) : 设置视口变换矩阵
+ set_view(P) : 设置投影变换矩阵
+ set_pixel(point, color) : 设置像素颜色

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
